title: feat: personalized stats based on local music history

body:
- New stats page with summaries of:
  - total tracks listened
  - minutes streamed
  - payable amount (hypothetical) for listened tracks for current month
  - artists reached
  - playlist/album plays
- Most (Top) Tracks/Albums/Playlists over selected period (week, month, year and all time)
- New "Recently Played" section in home screen
